name: AndroidManifest intent-filter Settings Checking
description: This app contains misconfiguration in "intent-filter" of at least one component of the `AndroidManifest.xml`.
remediation: Please verify that each "intent-filter" declared in the `AndroidManifest.xml` has at least one "action" and no `"android:exported"` or `"android:enabled"` attribute.

references.text: Further information on "intent-filter" and its configuration can be found on the Android Developer Guide [[1]].
